snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton claimed a victory of sorts, as a coal company backed away from a deal that would have used $18 million intended for the health care costs of retired miners to pay for lawyers and costs dealing with bankruptcy.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton claimed a victory of sorts, as a coal company backed away from a deal that would have used $18 million intended for the health care costs of retired miners to pay for lawyers and costs dealing with bankruptcy.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Claims Victory on Coal Miner Bankruptcy Settlement
